mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username username, u.nickname nickname, u.role_id roleId, r.role_name roleName, p.menu_code menuCode, p.permission_code permissionCode FROM user u LEFT JOIN role r ON r.role_id= u.role_id LEFT JOIN role_permission_relation rp ON u.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.permission_id AND rp.delete_status = '1' WHERE u.username = #{username} AND u.delete_status = '1'
SELECT p.permission_code permissionCode FROM permission p ORDER BY p.permission_id
SELECT p.menu_code menuCode FROM permission p ORDER BY p.permission_id
